reference_summary:
SIMPEXPE Spray Bottles Fine Mister, Refillable Cosmetic Containers for Cleaning 6.8 oz SIMPEXPE {'Brand': 'SIMPEXPE', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '200 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.3 x 2.4 x 2.2 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '7.3 x 2.4 x 2.2 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '761344588684'} Package includes: 2 spray bottles
This 7oz spray bottle has an adjustable nozzle and translucent bottle to easily see liquid levels. It can be used for a variety of home and garden application. Looks neat but small Eyeshadow Makeup Palette Matte Shimmer Glitter Eyeshadow Pallet High Pigmented Long Lasting Professional Metallic Eye Shadows Waterproof Make-Up 35 Colors (01) SACE LADY {'Brand': 'SACE LADY', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Matte, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '7.95 x 4.09 x 0.47 inches; 0.04 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AMZ-SL326'} I love the colors! and the pigment is amazing. it is super smooth and blends really well! I was happy to see it didn't break in shipping and was packaged well. I actually really like the pallet case its simple. Nice pallets! Keratin Secrets Do It Yourself Home Keratin System Keratin Secrets {'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 4.21 x 3.9 inches; 2.87 Pounds'} Keratin’s make the hair smoother (NOT STRAIGHT), shinier, and frizzy free for up to 8 months depending on the strength of the product. Keratin treatments rebound the keratin in your hair so that they are all put back into place. There are a lot of steps but don’t get discouraged because they’re quiet simple. To start of give 2 good shampoos with a clarifying shampoo (specifically the keratin complex one, then towel dry and blow dry the unconditioned hair. Once fully dry, make small sections and apply the treatment from roots to ends and comb through with a fine tooth comb to make sure hair is fully saturated. Let that sit for 30 minutes then blow dry again without washing out the product. Once fully dry the final step will be to straighten the hair with a flatiron so the keratin will set in your hair. After you’re completely done you won’t be able to wash your hair for up to 3 days depending on the strength in the solution. Smooth long curls Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit,10 Pairs Eyelashes Magnetic 2021 Upgraded 3D Fluffy Natural Waterproof Reusable Fox Eyes Kit False Eyelashes And Eyeliner. Alyxxndra {'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'Alyxxndra', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Disposable', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Package Dimensions': '9.21 x 6.1 x 0.71 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '788402874992', 'Manufacturer': 'Alyxxndra'} I like this pen I wish it worked a little better though. I have the liquid one as well and I feel that that one holds the mascara a little more but it is stickier so I really wanted the pen to work especially for the wing. But overall, I love the liner and the lashes so much easier than trying to mess with glue. Thank you for your products they arRead more about the review stating Liner and lashes a total game-changer. Love it IPL Hair Removal | Laser Hair Removal For Women - Upgraded 999,999 Flashes with 2 Flash Windows, Permanent Hair Removal For Legs, Arms, Underarm, Face,Bikini Line,Chest. (white& golden) Gift (white) MELUN {'Brand': 'MELUN', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Included Components': 'Charger', 'Head Type': 'Foil', 'Number of Blades': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 7.5 x 3.1 inches; 1.45 Pounds', 'UPC': '653846877987'} It arrived as described with two shielding glasses and a razor. The product itself is easy to use and the buttons on it are easy to figure out and operate. I got this product a few weeks ago so it's still too early to tell about its efficacy (which is why I gave it 4 stars but will update a few months from now when results can be actually measured). There are a few things I've already noticed however, on the sections where I've been using it the hair seems to be growing a bit thinner and taking also a bit longer to grow back. I'm comparing results by leaving a patch next to the area I'm treating alone and seeing how fast they both grow, the treated area seems to be lagging behind by a couple of days. We'll see what happens in a few months after which I will update. Works well - have to be consistent. Hair Removal for Women and Men - IPL Permanent Hair Remover Technology - 999,999 Flashes Automatic Hair Remover for Face, Arms, Legs, Bikini Area and Whole Body UNIWA {'Product Dimensions': '7.8 x 2.5 x 1.57 inches; 1.32 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'cwell'} I’ve been using this for a little over three months. I use it maybe every two to three days on my face, underarms and bikini area. The hair on my bikini area grows in slower so I figured in a few more months it should be nonexistent. Underarm hair still grows in the same amount and texture. It might require longer use. I had stray hairs on my jawline that would cause ingrown hairs and then hyperpigmentation from the scar. The main ones are gone!! The thicker ones I should say. Definitely have noticed a difference on my face. It’s worth a shot- it’s cheaper than going to a salon and it’s a quick process to treat the areas. Just don’t use the razor that comes in the box. It’s very rough and won’t remove the hair. After 3 months of use can slightly see results Shakira Perfumes - Dance for Women - Long Lasting - Femenine, Charming and Modern Perfume - Fruity Floral Notes - Ideal for Day Wear - 1.7 Fl Oz Shakira {'Brand': 'Shakira', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '50 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Dance', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '2.64 x 2.05 x 5.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8411061823033'} I love the bottle and the scent lasts all day. It is a sweet smell, but not floral. It has a clean smell and is very Feminine. The price is good. I like the scent, but it's not the exact scent I desire. Every time I fall in love with a new perfume. The material they are made from is very substantial. I would have liked some bows of the same color because I sometimes put 2 ponytails in our little girls' hair and I would have liked matching bows on each ponytail. Pretty little bows
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user has expanded their exploration of innovative personal care to include charming hair accessories, indicating a broader interest in products that enhance personal expression and style.

- **Capacity Preference:** They continue to favor moderately sized products that deliver effective results without unnecessary bulk.

- **Quality Awareness:** The user's discerning approach to product effectiveness is evident in their evaluations of hair accessories, focusing on material quality and usability alongside aesthetics.

- **Versatility:** A strong inclination for multipurpose items remains, as they appreciate products that serve various functions while providing delightful sensory experiences.

- **Material Preference:** The user consistently seeks lightweight and substantial materials in their selections, ensuring comfort and ease of use.

- **Review Engagement:** Actively engaged in community feedback, they provide thoughtful reviews that emphasize aesthetics and performance, reflecting long-term satisfaction with their purchases.

- **Aesthetic Sensibility:** The user appreciates aesthetically pleasing products, continuing to seek beautifully designed items that seamlessly blend form and function.

- **Fragrance Exploration:** Their interest in fragrances persists, particularly in finding scents that balance sweet and clean notes, complementing their overall style and personality.

In summary, the user seeks versatile, aesthetically appealing, and effective products that resonate with their personal style while maintaining an active role in community discussions about quality and performance.
